ygData.subject: Re: Battle at CF
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops! Sorry about that. I never knew DarkWolf split. * Iron Raptor growled from behind her helm as she watchjed the charge Scattershot was sending interfere

Oops! Sorry about that. I never knew DarkWolf split.

* Iron Raptor growled from behind her helm as she watchjed the charge 
Scattershot was sending interfere with her energy.
Feeling the kickback as the energy of the explosion was sucked into the beam 
only to make it stronger.
The sword in her hands was almost burning hot, and she was sure that it 
wouldn't be able to take the heat of this energy for too much longer.
Her fingers were already cramping!
Iron Raptor concintrated her thoughts and directed them to Prowl while she 
kept the beam going.*
< Prowl? How are you holding up?>
Just then the dropping motion of Nemisis cought her attention and she looked 
towards his crippled form as he came to earth.
Her scanners detecting that he was still awake but very near to stasis lock.
Perhaps...it was time to finish him.
< I think it's time...to end a threat.> Her thoughts didn't seem so sure and 
she projected the image of the fallen Nemisis, knowing that Prowl would pick 
them up even those those thoughts weren't directed to him.
But so many things played in her mind, about what the impact of what she 
would do would have on this battle.
She would have killed a threat, but then the Alliance would be enraged and 
perhaps finish this battle...by finishing the Maximals.
Iron Raptor sighed.
< We've lost already. We lost the moment Oblitercon took shape.>
It was the truth too, and from what her scanners showed, there were enemies 
in the ship. And that the CF had been damaged pretty bad.
She glared at the lump on the ground which was Nemisis Enforcer, walking up 
to him before her shoulder snapped forward from the impact of Scattershots 
charges struck her.
Iron Raptor winced and grit her teeth, biting back the pain. Her eyes taking 
a good look around her and seeing all of the carnage and battles.
All of the mech-fluid and bodies.
This was war. Real war.
And she was sick of it!
Iron Raptor retracted her helm, her hair falling out and down her back, her 
head slowly turning towards Scattershot, not with a frown, but with a blank 
expression.
The beam had disappeared by now and the blade shimmered as she lowered the 
tip of it down towards the crippled Nemisis, resting the tip just above his 
spark cavity.
Her free hand rested against her shoulder, mech-fluid leaking between her 
fingers.*

" Scattershot...just how much do Alliance bots value their superiors? Not 
much?"

* normal voice, the sword still just above Nemisis Enforcer's spark.
Didn't really matter what his answer was, as soon as he gave her one that 
sword would be through Nemisis's cavity and into his spark.
But it was too bad that he wasn't part of a gustalt, then she would be 
removing a vital limb and the gustalt wouldn't be able to form without, 
say...a leg.
Iron Raptor's mint ticked with that thought,  dwelling more on it and 
turning it around in her mind.*
